subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Robin Lopez scored a season-high 19 points, and Carmelo Anthony had a team-high 25 as the Knicks won their third straight, beating a team that had pounded them in November.
snippet: Robin Lopez scored a season-high 19 points, and Carmelo Anthony had a team-high 25 as the Knicks won their third straight, beating a team that had pounded them in November.
